description: This file defines a script that uses an AI agent to perform image editing tasks, specifically adding a background element to an image, utilizing the Gemini model and PIL for image processing.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with models to perform tasks.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Response object returned by the agent after execution.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Media class representing an image, used as input for the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Model class representing the Gemini image generation model.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a prompt and images, returning a response.

methods.name: agent.get_images
methods.description: Retrieves generated images from the agent.

methods.name: PILImage.open
methods.description: Opens an image file or byte stream as a PIL Image object.
